translations: n.品脱（液量单位，约等于半升）；<英>一品脱啤酒；<英>一品脱牛奶；<英>一品脱大的杯子所能盛下的量（贝类计量单位）；一品脱容器

sentences.sentence: One unit of alcohol is equal to half a pint of beer.
sentences.translation: 一单位酒精等于半品脱啤酒。

sentences.sentence: Give Roger another pint, Imogen, and I'll have the same again.
sentences.translation: 给罗杰再来一品脱，伊摩根，我也再来一个。

sentences.sentence: A pint and a half of beer can produce the effect and in men it may last 24 hours.
sentences.translation: 一品脱半的啤酒就可以产生这种效果，对男性来说，这种效果可以持续24小时。
